dc:title: On Pilgrimage - October 1959
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reminisces about her love of cars, describing all the old cars and trucks that have been a part of her and Catholic Worker life. Then explains why they are getting rid of their two cars at Peter Maurin farm.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 757 1959-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
